name: The Things You Do For Love
storyline:
You think you're in love. They make your heart skip a beat, your train of thought miss a stop, and your mind lose control. It feels so nice, and so you crave that. You crave them.

This is what love feels like, right?

Play as a love-struck romantic who is trying to understand these complicated feelings all while taking down the competition! Urgh, there's so much to do but so little time to do it as prom is in three days!

Stalk your crush? Eliminate a rival? Or, perhaps make a new friend along the way?

Just go win love — no matter what, no matter how!
summary:
A dark romantic-comedy where you get to play as a hopeless yandere who is desperately trying to understand their newfound, romantic feelings all while taking down the competition.

Whether you decide to stalk your crush, eliminate your rivals, or make new friends, just go out there and win some love — no matter what, no matter how!
